prompt: Create a modern chat list page with a clean white background featuring a top app bar with the title 'Chats' and a search icon. Display a scrollable list of chat conversations where each chat item contains a circular profile picture (50px diameter) on the left, followed by the contact name in bold dark text, a preview of the last message in gray text below the name, and the timestamp aligned to the right in small gray text. Each chat item should have a subtle divider line and appropriate padding. Include proper spacing between elements and ensure the layout is responsive with smooth scrolling behavior.
